caption.title: Prevalence of Leptospira infection in each species across habitat types.
caption.p: Each point represents the prevalence of Leptospira infection at a site and season, color coded by habitat type. The black lines represent the range in the values. The last four species below the dotted line are introduced to Madagascar. Points are offset slightly to allow visualization for points that overlap. The numbers in parentheses next to species labels represent the number of samples that tested positive and negative, respectively.
